title: I need a freelance developer
desc: Develop and deploy a web application for which some initial functionalities are listed below:(1)	User access controla.	All visitors shall register for the first time and create a personalized loginb.	All users shall enter and maintain some minimum data requirementsc.	User access and password can be done via user email and/or phoned.	Captcha type security access to avoid machine driven hackinge.	Users shall have the option to choosef.	Users shall be granted and categorized as “visitor”, “potential customer”, “paid customer”g.	Visitors can see general information and results but cannot create or run casesh.	potential customer can create and run up to 10 cases (i.e. limited)i.	Paid customer can create and run a larger number of cases (i.e. 10,000)(2)	Case managementa.	Valid user can create new cases or modify existing casesb.	Valid user inputs some minimum data required to build a casec.	Valid user can save an incomplete case for future retrievald.	Valid user can save up to three incomplete cases, which shall be deleted within 10 days.e.	Valid user can submit cases (with complete and valid data) for Application Calculationsf.	Valid user can submit and store up to 10 valid casesg.	Valid user can access results from current and previously calculated casesh.	Valid user can compare results from current and previously calculated casesi.	Administrator can access, edit, download, delete all cases at any stage(3)	Application Calculationsa.	Application shall perform a series of calculations from input data and specific casesb.	All Calculated results are stored in databasec.	Good quality results are made available for user access and retrievald.	Bad calculations are store for administration and debugging(4)	UI/UXa.	Application shall enable simple user input interfacesb.	Application shall generate some preconfigured charts based on user case selectionc.	Application shall allow some basic graph configuration and printing capabilities(5)	Database managementa.	Application shall store each user profile and preference informationb.	Application shall gather and store some key data from the internet (i.e. stock prices)c.	Application shall store each case input and calculated results in database for futured.	Application shall allow import and export cases based on user accessabilityCurrent website is hosted in [url removed, login to view] and the website was developed in WordPress, but I’m willing to consider a better place to host this application.
